QueryResult.text: SELECT r.id RESOURCE_ID, s.slice_date QUARTER_START_DATE, SUM(NVL(CASE WHEN r.resource_type = 1 THEN s.slice ELSE 0 END,0)) AVAIL_Q_HOURS, SUM(NVL(CASE WHEN r.resource_type = 0 THEN s.slice ELSE 0 END,0)) AVAIL_L_HOURS FROM srm_resources r INNER JOIN prj_blb_slices s ON r.id = s.prj_object_id INNER JOIN prj_blb_slicerequests sr ON s.slice_request_id = sr.id WHERE (sr.request_name = 'QUARTERLYRESOURCEAVAILCURVE') AND (r.resource_type <= 1) GROUP BY r.id, s.slice_date
